name: 西斯科·洛佩斯
name_full: 西斯科·洛佩斯 Cisco Lopez

last_movies.title: 夜魔侠：重生 第一季
法律与秩序：特殊受害者 第二十四季

introduction: Cisco Lopez, born on March 17, 2000, in Brooklyn, New York, had a clear vision of his future career path from a young age. He pursued his passion for acting and obtained a Bachelor's degree in Theater. Along his journey, Cisco has acted in several independent films and gained experience both in front of and behind the camera, expanding his creative horizons. His dedication to his craft and willingness to take on diverse roles demonstrate his commitment to his artistic growth. Cisco aspires to be an inspiration for the next generation of Afro Latino Inner City Youth, hoping to motivate them to pursue their dreams.
